channel.title: 《C++运行时端的使用上手》的评论
channel.description: Tencent behaviac, Game AI, Behavior Tree, Finite State Machine, Hierarchical Task Network, BT FSM HTN, 腾讯开源, 游戏AI, 行为树,有限状态机,分层任务网络

item.title: 作者：quinnpan
item.dc:creator: quinnpan
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-18">郑经纬</a>.
请去http://bbs.behaviac.com上反馈问题，这个地方粘贴错误代码的格式不是很友好。/
item.content:encoded:
In reply to 郑经纬.

请去http://bbs.behaviac.com上反馈问题，这个地方粘贴错误代码的格式不是很友好。/

item.title: 作者：郑经纬
item.dc:creator: 郑经纬
item.description: 24 bytes in 1 blocks are definitely lost in loss record 59 of 429 at 0x4A05DBC: memalign (vg_replace_malloc.c:858) by 0x8447DA: behaviac::MemDefaultAllocator::AllocAligned(unsigned long, unsigned long, char const*, char const *, unsigned int) (in /home/QLServer/server_new/fight_server/GServer/GServer)
item.content:encoded:
24 bytes in 1 blocks are definitely lost in loss record 59 of 429
at 0x4A05DBC: memalign (vg_replace_malloc.c:858)
by 0x8447DA: behaviac::MemDefaultAllocator::AllocAligned(unsigned long, unsigned long, char const*, char const
*, unsigned int) (in /home/QLServer/server_new/fight_server/GServer/GServer)
